Uses of Interface
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.Connection

Packages that use Connection 
Package Description
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution
Provides classes and interfaces defining the components for enabling the communication between the actor spaces of an application.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.activemq
Provides classes defining the components supporting the communication between some actor spaces with the ActiveMQ JMS technology.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.jeromq
Provides classes defining the components supporting the communication between some actor spaces with the JeroMQ technology.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.mina
Provides classes defining the components supporting the communication between some actor spaces with the Apache MINA technology.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.rmi
Provides classes defining the components supporting the communication between some actor spaces with the RMI technology.
